alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 11:12PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan and northwestern Simpson Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1012 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Russellville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Logan and northwestern Simpson Counties, including the following locations... Salmons, Dennis, Middleton, Auburn and South Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
